name: The Temptation Dabolim - 24x7 Complete Food Shop

reviews.review_text:
Temptation is my last-minute go-to place for a range of cravings. Located on the Vasco-Verna/Airport road, it’s an affordable and convenient stop for a quick bite. I’ve been here multiple times, and while the pricing is reasonable, the food quality matches what you pay for. It’s not the most delicious out there, but it’s decent, with consistency at a good 80-90% of the time.

Speaking specifically about this outlet, the staff experience is mixed—50% are diligent and maintain hygiene, while the other 50% seem indifferent, either bored or working just for the paycheck. You can tell from their demeanor and lack of attention to cleanliness. Management should take this seriously, as this outlet has potential, but a few careless staff members could tarnish the brand’s reputation.

I’ve noticed unclean tables and cockroaches on multiple occasions(Top Section), and poor hygiene practices among some kitchen staff. This needs urgent attention to improve the overall experience.

If you want to experience the best of Temptation, I’d recommend visiting their Margao store instead.

A short walk from the airport,

Delicious food at affordable prices, if you have some time to kill at the airport then I would definitely recommend this place.

All items are priced reasonably. They have baguettes, soft rolls, sandwiches,cheesecakes, cakes ,snacks , coffee,tea..etc...all priced between 20-200

From the sitting area you can spot Indian Air force jets, helicopters.

Visited twice, tried cinnamon carrot cake and blueberry cheesecake. Both excellent and delicious and just the right amount pf sweet. Pleasantly surprised with the place.

They don't have a lot of coffee options (like cappuccino etc) just basic machine coffee (even cold coffee is from a dispenser) but it's decent.
